one_liner.value: AI-powered Real-Time Location System (RTLS) providing indoor navigation, asset tracking, and safety solutions for enterprises using BLE 5.1 technology

industry.value: IoT / Indoor Location Technology / Enterprise Infrastructure

headquarter_location.value: Saudi Arabia (strong presence in KSA with multiple deployments)

target_customer.value: Healthcare institutions, airports, universities, retail malls, enterprises, industrial facilities, smart campuses

press_releases.value: Penguin Location Services Announces Breakthrough RTLS 3.0 Platform (2026), Partnership with Zebra Technologies for healthcare asset visibility

notes: Three main products: PenNav (indoor navigation), PenTrack (RTLS asset tracking), PenSafe (location-enabled safety). Uses BLE 5.1 + advanced location algorithms. Key case studies: MNGHA King Abdulaziz Medical City (Riyadh), KSAU university (14 colleges, 3 campuses, 17,000 students), STC Smart Campus (40 acres), KAFD financial district (1.6M sqm). Partners include GWA Hygiene. Technology partners ecosystem. Sells hardware dev kit (gateway, locators, card tags). Has ROI calculator for hospitals. Offers white paper on BLE 5.1 location algorithms. WordPress site.

one_liner.value: Consumer app helping shoppers save 25-60% on fresh surplus products from local grocery stores while fighting food waste

pricing.value: Free app for consumers. Surplus products from partner grocery stores at 25-60% off daily.

headquarter_location.value: Canada (Quebec - bilingual EN/FR site, partners with Canadian grocers)

target_customer.value: Consumers looking to save on groceries, grocery store partners (IGA, Metro, Maxi, Super C, Jean Coutu, Walmart, No Frills)

notes: Consumer/B2C marketplace app, not strictly B2B SaaS (but has B2B side for grocery partners). Available on iOS and Android. Partners with major Canadian grocery chains: IGA, Metro, Maxi, Super C, Jean Coutu, Walmart, No Frills. Bilingual EN/FR (Canadian market). Referral program: $5 for each referral. Has inventory section, FAQ, blog. /about page returns 404. Has affiliate program. Webflow-based site. Uses HubSpot for marketing. Copyright 2026.

one_liner.value: All-in-one modern scrapyard and recycling software platform covering ticketing, inventory, dispatch, payments, compliance, and reporting for scrap recyclers

pricing.value: Single subscription fee covers software, onboarding, and ongoing support. No hidden fees or monthly support bills.

target_customer.value: Scrap metal recyclers of all sizes, ferrous and non-ferrous operations

notes: Official Innovation Partner of ReMA (Recycled Materials Association) for 2026. Capterra rating 4.9, SoftwareAdvice 4.9. Products: Facility Pro and Dispatch Pro. Features: scale ticketing, pricing management, real-time inventory with weighted average costing, processing rules, payments/check printing, AP/AR, financial accounts, PO/SO management, auto document generation (packing lists, BOL, invoices), state/local compliance automation, reporting, QuickBooks/NetSuite/Microsoft Dynamics/Sage integration, dispatch, bin tracking. Web-based with Operator Mobile App (iOS/Android) and Driver Mobile App. External customer portal. Full timezone coverage in USA. Case studies: Universal Service Recycling, Circosta Iron & Metal, Alco Iron & Metal.

Domain harvard.com could not be loaded - navigation timed out or redirected. The domain may refer to Harvard University (harvard.edu), Harvard Bioscience (harvardbioscience.com), or another Harvard-branded entity. Unable to determine which company was intended without the full TLD.

one_liner.value: Unified corporate travel booking and management platform for hotels and flights across 2 million hotels, 350 airlines, and 190 countries with analytics and automated price-drop refunds

pricing.value: Save up to 20% on bookings. Multiple payment options: letter of guarantee, bank card, wire transfer, deposit, credit limit.

target_customer.value: Companies of all sizes needing corporate travel booking, management and analytics

notes: Offers both business and leisure travel booking. 2 million hotels, 350 airlines, 190 countries. 24/7 support via chat. Features: instant confirmation (~90 sec vs 5+ hours), airline miles/hotel rewards accumulation, flexible booking conditions, automatic price-drop refund, detailed company travel analytics. Blog with travel content. Partnership with Bolt Business (50% off first 25 rides). Also offers visa support and free PDF service. Has Standard Contractual Clauses for data processing.

one_liner.value: AI-native GRC platform (ANDROMEDA) providing continuous compliance automation, security monitoring, risk management, and pentesting with Agentic AI

headquarter_location.value: San Francisco Bay Area, California, USA

target_customer.value: Technology companies, SaaS businesses, and enterprises needing security compliance (SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, GDPR, NIST, PCI DSS)

notes: Founded in Bay Area, built AI-native from day one. Platform called ANDROMEDA with 4 modules: Andromeda Security (user access, trust center, security questionnaire & RFP automation, cloud security), Andromeda Compliance (compliance automation, policy automation), Andromeda Risk (vendor risk, enterprise risk, cyber quantification), Andromeda Pentest (manual expert-led, vulnerability scan, AI exploit simulation). Supports 10+ frameworks: SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, GDPR, ISO 42001 AIMS, NIST AI RMF, NIST 800-53, SOC 1, PCI DSS. Leadership: Naveen Bisht (Founder & CEO), Ravi Someshwar (VP Engineering), Ravi Ling (VP Product Management). Customers: Dagknows, Firstshift, Prodigal, Nile, Fracta, Araali Networks, Roost.ai, MindFire, Blockfenders. WordPress site.

one_liner.value: Professional managed lifestyle services platform for multifamily residential properties offering house cleaning, chores, handyman, dog walking, food/grocery delivery, and home shopping

target_customer.value: Multifamily property managers, apartment residents, service professionals

notes: Proudly serving since 2017. Multi-sided marketplace: Residents (book services), Managers (property management), Service Pros (earn money), Partners (business partnerships). Key metrics: 3 million+ homes powered, 1,000+ cities served, 100,000+ five star ratings, 200,000+ appointments completed. Available on iOS and Android. Services include house cleaning, chores, food/grocery service, handyman, dog walking, home shopping. Squarespace-based site. Social: LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube. Phone support available.
